title: Bill Keenan on the Shift From Pro Hockey to Wall Street
itunes:title: Bill Keenan on the Shift From Pro Hockey to Wall Street
description:
Author, screenwriter, and former pro hockey player Bill Keenan joins the podcast to discuss his transition from playing professional puck in Europe, to investment banking, and everything in between. He speaks with Michael Barr, Mike Lynch, and Scarlet Fu about pro hockey in a Covid-19 world, and adapting his first book, Odd Man Rush, to film.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
